sentences.en: A little leaven leavens the whole lump of dough.
sentences.cn: 加5:9一点面酵能使全团都发起来.

sentences.en: A little leaven of sin can gradually break down the spiritual barriers and invade the soul.
sentences.cn: 一点点罪恶的酵都能逐渐瓦解灵性的堡垒,侵害心灵.

sentences.en: An agent that causes rising , fermentation , or ferment; leaven.
sentences.cn: 用酵母使之发起来; 关于生面团.

sentences.en: Gal. 5:9 A little leaven leavens the whole lump.
sentences.cn: 加五9一点面酵能使全团都发起来.

sentences.en: He found congenial officers who knew how to leaven war's rigours with riotous enjoyment.
sentences.cn: 他找到了懂得用狂欢来冲淡战争的严酷的志趣相投的军官。

sentences.en: He was saying that leaven has power.
sentences.cn: 祂是在说,面酵是有能力的.

sentences.en: It'shall not be baken with leaven.
Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?
sentences.cn: 岂不知一点面酵能使全团发起来 么 ?

sentences.en: Know ye that a little leaven leaven the whole lump?
sentences.cn: 岂不知小小的一点酵,足以使整团面粉发起来 吗 ?

sentences.en: Made light and high by yeast or other leaven.
sentences.cn: 发酵的用酵母或其它发酵剂使… 轻而高。

sentences.en: These men have been the leaven in the lump of the race.
sentences.cn: 如果说这个种族是块面团,这些人便是发酵剂.

sentences.en: Under his influence the leaven of disaffection was fast doing its work.
sentences.cn: 所以在他的影响下,叛逆的酵很快发起来了.

sentences.en: We often use leaven when baking breads.
sentences.cn: 烤面包时,我们经常使用发酵剂.

sentences.en: You are the leaven which binds together the entire fabric of our national system of defence.
sentences.cn: 你们是构成我国整个国防系统的最重要要素.

sentences.en: You are the leaven which binds together the entire fabric of our national system of defense.
sentences.cn: 你们是联系我国防御系统全部机构的酵母.

sentences.en: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?
sentences.cn: 你们这自夸是不好的. 岂不知一点面酵能使全团发起来 吗 .

words.tran_cn: 发酵；酵母；引起渐变的因素
酵母；酵素；潜移默化的影响

trans.tran_cn: 酵母，面肥，潜移默化的影响
trans.tran_en: a substance, especially yeast, that is added to a mixture of flour and water so that it will swell and can be baked into bread

trans.tran_cn: 使（面团）发酵，在…中掺入改变的因素
